syntaxes.insert:
var zero int = 0
var one, two uint64 = 1, 2
syntaxes.replacement:
var a int = 0
 var b, c uint64 = 1, 2

syntaxes.insert:
var zero int
var one, two uint64
syntaxes.replacement:
var a int
var b, c uint64

syntaxes.insert:
switch { case x < y: f1()
case x < z: g()
case x == 4: h()
}
syntaxes.replacement:
switch { case a < b: f1()
case c < d: g()
case e == 4: f()
}

syntaxes.insert:
select {
  case x := <-c:
    println(x)
  case y <- c:
    println(5)
  case <-time.After(1):
    println(6)
  default:
    return
}
syntaxes.replacement:
select {
  case a := <-c:
    println(x)
  case b <- c:
    println(5)
  case <-time.After(2):
    println(6)
  default:
    return
}

syntaxes.insert:
type a b
type (
 a b
 c d
 )
syntaxes.replacement:
type a' b'
type (
 a' b'
 c' d'
 )

syntaxes.insert:
make(chan<- int)
make(chan<- int, (new - old))
make(chan<- int, 5, 10)
 new(map[string]string)
syntaxes.replacement:
make(chan<- string)
make(chan<- string, (new - old))
make(chan<- string, 7, 11)
 new(map[int]int)

syntaxes.insert:
type (
a func(int) int
b func(int, string) (bool, error)
)
syntaxes.replacement:
type (
x func(string) string
y func(string, int) (chan, error)
)
